---
title: "Visualize a MALDI spectrum in base R"
author: "Chase M. Clark"
categories: [blogexample, mass spectrometry]
date: "2023-12-30"
---


Just an example post until we get up and running 





Let's visualize a spectrum in base R


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sample_spectrum <- read.csv("https://metabolomics-usi.gnps2.org/csv/?usi1=mzspec%3AGNPS%3AGNPS-LIBRARY%3Aaccession%3ACCMSLIB00004679205")
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(sample_spectrum, type="p")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
